entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 5 except plus 1 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow over eastern sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5 except plus 1 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
